Module com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis
Package com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis.model

Class AbstractPlayers

java.lang.Object
com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis.model.AbstractPlayers
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemUse
Direct Known Subclasses:
Luis, Marco
public abstract class AbstractPlayers extends Object implements ItemUse
This class represent a playable character in the game. A playable character has many features, as life points and levels. It also possesses combat characteristics such as attack, defense, fighting points, and a state of immortality.
Author:
Christian Jesus Parra Cofre.
